      • UserPreferencesUtil

        public UserPreferencesUtil(WikiUser user)
        Initialize an instance of this utility class for a given user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose preferences will be retrieved, or null if default preferences should be retrieved.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreference

        public UserPreferencesUtil.UserPreferenceItem getPreference(String preferenceKey)
        Convenience method to retrieve the UserPreferenceItem for a single preference.
        Parameters:
        preferenceKey -
        Returns:
        The user preference corresponding to the specified key.

      • getGroups

        public Map<String,Map<String,UserPreferencesUtil.UserPreferenceItem>> getGroups()
        The method return a map with the following structure: pref_group_key -> Map(pref_key -> Instance of UserPreferenceItem for pref_key) UserPreferenceItems implements the getters necessary to automate the display of user preferences choices in JSTL.
        Returns:
        A mapping of user preferences (key-value) grouped by preference group.
